other_title: Mowkli: Fata Al-Adghaal ~ Al-Jamahiriya TV broadcast 1994 (Arabic)
The Jungle Book: Mowgli the Boy (Japanese)
The Jungle Book: The Adventures of Mowgli
ジャングルブック　少年モーグリ (Japanese)
plot: After his parents died, Mowgli is raised by the Wolf Pack of the Seeonee Forest led by Akela and other wild animals such as Bagheera and Baloo. The young boy goes through several heartwarming, bittersweet, and life-threatening adventures as he seeks after his true purpose in life. And one of many dangers he has to face is the man-eating tiger, Shere Khan...
opening_theme: "GET UP~Ai o Shinjite" (GET UP～愛を信じて) by Toshiya Igarashi
ending_theme: "A Child Is Learning" by Suzi Marsh
"Chikyū no Ko" (地球の子) by Ushio Hashimoto
